Added variation sharing and extension messages to our feature flags Chrome extension in ReactJS
Improved Cloudflare Worker infrastructure by creating CI pipelines and helping create a release schedule

work.name: Block (formerly Square)
work.description: An American financial services and digital payments company
work.summary: Built tooling to assist in the block-wide migration to Kubernetes
highlights: Led the development of a Kubernetes Configuration Management (kube config mgmt) service in Go
Collaborated with internal teams including legal and security to improve kube config mgmt and start the open-source process
Created a CI flow to securely validate and store Kubernetes manifests in AWS S3 buckets
Designed a Go application to detect calls to the CentOS OOM (out of memory) killer to notify application owners if their service was killed
